title: Urban food deserts as ecological and economic justice issue
description: Urban food deserts as ecological and economic justice issue
content:
Scenario: Urban food deserts as ecological and economic justice issue
    Given Marcus may live in urban food desert
    And food access connects to land use and economic systems
    When Marcus experiences difficulty accessing fresh food
    Then he should understand food deserts as systemic failure
    And the personal_agent should explain how urban planning affects food access
    And he should learn that food justice requires ecological and economic change
    And his lived experience should inform political consciousness
    And care economy should include bioregional food sovereignty
    And his struggles should fuel commitment to food system transformation
